title: Hobbies & Free Time
description: Learn vocabulary about hobbies, leisure activities, and entertainment.

words.meaning: an activity you enjoy doing in your free time
words.example: My hobby is playing the guitar.
words.mnemonic: 하비 = 하루하루 비는 시간에 하는 일

words.meaning: to gather similar items as a hobby
words.example: He collects stamps from different countries.
words.koreanPronunciationTip: 컬렉트 - 첫 음절은 약하게, 두 번째 음절 강세

words.meaning: the activity of making pictures with paint
to become a member of a group
words.example: I want to join a dance club.

words.meaning: to do something repeatedly to improve
an ability to do something well
words.mnemonic: skill = 스스로 킬러가 될 수 있는 능력

words.example: We went to a concert last weekend.

words.meaning: a public display of art or objects
words.example: There's a photography exhibition at the museum.
I enjoy outdoor activities like hiking.
words.exampleMeaning: 저는 등산 같은 야외 활동을 즐겨요.
words.mnemonic: outdoor = 아웃(밖)에서 도어(문) 열고 하는 활동
indoor = 인(안)에서 도어(문) 닫고 하는 활동

words.example: What do you do on weekends?
I like to relax at home after work.
words.exampleMeaning: 퇴근 후 집에서 쉬는 것을 좋아해요.

words.meaning: feeling tired because something is not interesting
words.example: I get bored on rainy days.

words.meaning: a person just starting to learn something

words.example: I want to improve my cooking skills.

words.meaning: a person who belongs to a group
words.example: She's a member of a book club.

words.meaning: time when you are free from work
words.example: I enjoy reading in my leisure time.

words.meaning: activities that people enjoy watching or doing
words.example: Movies are a popular form of entertainment.

words.meaning: activities involving making things by hand
words.example: She does arts and crafts on weekends.

words.meaning: the activity of going for long walks in nature
catching fish as a sport or hobby
exercises for body and mind relaxation
words.example: I do yoga three times a week.
words.exampleMeaning: 저는 일주일에 세 번 요가를 해요.
명상은 스트레스를 줄이는 데 도움이 돼요.

words.meaning: a place to watch plays or performances
words.example: We're going to the theater tonight.

words.meaning: a digital audio program you can download
words.example: I listen to podcasts while commuting.

words.meaning: making clothes with yarn and needles

words.example: I take a pottery class on Saturdays.

words.meaning: making pictures with pencils or pens

words.example: I enjoy sketching in the park.
There are beautiful sculptures in the park.
She goes to a fitness center.
words.mnemonic: fitness = 핏(fit, 맞다) + ness = 건강에 맞는 상태

words.example: I go jogging in the park.

words.meaning: looking at and understanding written words
putting words on paper or screen
the state of being calm and free from stress

exercises.question: What does 'hobby' mean?
options: an activity you enjoy in free time
exercises.answer: an activity you enjoy in free time
